titles.title: Veterans Administration Backlog Accountability Act of 2021
Veterans Administration Backlog Accountability Act of 2021
To direct the Inspector General of the Department of Veterans Affairs to submit to Congress a report on the backlog of disability compensation claims submitted to the Secretary of Veterans Affairs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Disability Assistance and Memorial Affairs.

bill.summary:
Veterans Administration Backlog Accountability Act of 2021
This bill requires the Inspector General of the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) to report on the backlog of VA disability compensation claims.
